site.title: Skilled Trade Manpower
site.description: Your Done-For-You services partner. We provide the labor, manage the workforce, and deliver completed projects in construction, installation, and maintenance.

hero.title: You Don't Manage People. We Deliver Results.
hero.subtitle: We are not a staffing agency. We are a Done-For-You services company. We hire, manage, and supervise the workforce to execute your projects from start to finish.

projectExecution.title: Project Execution
projectExecution.desc: We take full responsibility for labor-intensive projects, ensuring they are completed on time and to spec.

fieldOps.title: Field Operations
fieldOps.desc: Deploying managed teams to handle on-site operations, logistics, and manual tasks.

installation.title: Installation & Setup
installation.desc: Complete installation services for equipment, fixtures, and systems. We handle the entire process.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Support
maintenance.desc: Ongoing maintenance crews to keep your facilities and assets in top condition.

workforce.title: On-Demand Workforce Execution
workforce.desc: Need a job done? We provide the managed labor force to execute it immediately.

specialProjects.title: Special Projects
specialProjects.desc: Custom labor solutions for one-off, complex, or large-scale operational challenges.

step1.title: Define the Scope
step1.desc: Tell us what needs to be done, the timeline, and the expected outcome.

step2.title: We Deploy & Manage
step2.desc: We assign a dedicated team and supervisor. We handle all scheduling, management, and QC.

step3.title: Job Completed
step3.desc: You receive the finished work. No HR headaches, no payroll issues, no supervision required.

contact.title: Discuss Your Project
contact.subtitle: Tell us about the work you need done. We'll handle the execution.
contact.name: Name
